key.name: show-details
key.description: Stores the state of the expander that contains the list of changes and the description

key.name: window-width
key.description: Stores the width of the update-manager dialog

key.name: window-height
key.description: Stores the height of the update-manager dialog

key.name: check-dist-upgrades
key.description: This key is deprecated in favor of the file /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades Check automatically if a new version of the current distribution is available and offer to upgrade (if possible).

key.name: autoclose-install-window
key.summary: Auto close the install window after successful install
key.description: If this key is set the install window will be automatically closed on successful installation.

key.name: show-versions
key.description: If this key is set the main update list window will show version information (from version to version).

key.name: summary-before-name
key.summary: Show package summary before package name in update list
key.description: If this key is set, the main update list window will show the package summary before the package name.

key.name: first-run
key.description: If this key is set a first run welcome message will be presented.

key.name: check-new-release-ignore
key.summary: make check-new-release-gtk ignore a given new release
key.description: This will permanently hide the new release prompt from check-new-release-gtk. Note that the small button in the main update-manager UI will still be there.

key.name: launch-time
key.summary: Time when update-manager got launched last
key.description: The last time update-manager was run.

key.name: launch-count
key.summary: Number of times update-manager has been launched
key.description: Number of times update-manager has been launched.
